item.title: W3Techs reports that 12.2% of the top 1 million and 19.1% of the top 100k sites on the web (according to Alexa) use nginx. Compare where we were only two years ago.
item.description:
2012-08-22

W3Techs reports that 12.2% of the top 1 million and 19.1% of the top 100k sites on the web (according to Alexa) use nginx. Compare where we were only two years ago.
